duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain iOS applications using Swift, Objective-C, Cocoa Touch, UIKit, and XCode in an agile environment.
Participate in the entire app development lifecycle, from concept to delivery, and ensure high-quality, performance, and responsiveness of the applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Mentor and coach other iOS developers, participate in code reviews, and pair programming.
Utilize modern development principles and CI/CD tools to continuously deliver high-quality apps that guarantee stable and performant experiences.
Consume RESTful web services and manage dependencies using Swift Package Manager and/or Cocoapods.
Implement testing concepts and frameworks using XCTest and XCUITest, with a focus on DevSecOps.
Stay updated with mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies to create performant, resilient, and robust iOS apps.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
